var.name: prefix
var.desc: Holds the Foldername where the displayed Picture is stored; is read per Javascript

var.name: tilesize
var.desc: Holds the tilesize of each tile, except of bordertiles all tiles are yxy in size

var.name: maximized
var.desc: Holds if the View is fullscreen or only partial

var.name: zoomWidth
var.desc: Defines if the Viewer is set so that the Image is displayed completely over width

var.name: zoomScreen
var.desc: Defines if the Viewer is set so that the Image is displayed completely on the screen as big as possible

var.name: blendEffects
var.desc: Holds if Effects like Sliding and Fading will be used or not

var.name: chapHover
var.desc: Defines the hover-modus: hover with slide Effect (true), standard hover (false)

var.name: chapHoverDelay
var.desc: Defines the delay time for a single hover coloration

var.name: chapHoverStep
var.desc: Defines color changing in each step of hover coloration

var.name: pagenumber
var.desc: Holds the default Page which is displayed if no Page was entered through the URL

var.name: mets_uri
var.desc: Holds the path to the METS XML File

var.name: styleFolderUri
var.desc: Path to the Styles location folder. With closing /

var.name: styleNameMODDED
var.desc: The actual Name of the Style which is used, is identical with the name of the Stylefoldername. Without closing /
